summary: The customer called Contoso Wireless to express their dissatisfaction with the downgrade of services they experienced since switching to the company. The agent provided the customer with information about their highest speed connection and unlimited data plan, which costs $59.99 per month. The agent also informed the customer about additional features and discounts that come with the upgraded service, such as free access to the online customer portal, 24/7 customer support, and discounts on select products and services. The customer was also offered a discount of up to 20% if they sign up for multiple years at once.
